official-pdf-upload.sub-headline: Allows upload of PDF-documents to officially sign them
official-pdf-upload.upload-text: In this area you can upload PDF-documents up to a size of 32MB. The PDF-documents can also be located in a ZIP-file.
official-pdf-upload.upload-area-text: In this area you can upload PDF-documents up to a size of 32MB via Drag & Drop or by selecting them directly. The PDF-documents can also be located in a ZIP-file.
official-pdf-upload.queued-files-empty2: You can now upload more documents
official-pdf-upload.upload-status-file-text: ({{fileSize}}) is currently uploading and being processed...
official-pdf-upload.confirm-page-leave: Are you sure you want to leave this page? There are still signed documents ready to be downloaded.

qualified-pdf-upload.sub-headline: Allows upload of PDF-documents to personally sign them
qualified-pdf-upload.upload-text: In this area you can upload PDF-documents up to a size of 32MB. The PDF-documents can also be located in a ZIP-file.
qualified-pdf-upload.upload-area-text: In this area you can upload PDF-documents up to a size of 32MB via Drag & Drop or by selecting them directly. The PDF-documents can also be located in a ZIP-file.
qualified-pdf-upload.queued-files-empty2: You can now upload more documents
qualified-pdf-upload.upload-status-file-text: ({{fileSize}}) is currently uploading and being processed...
qualified-pdf-upload.confirm-page-leave: Are you sure you want to leave this page? There are still signed documents ready to be downloaded.

signature-verification.upload-text: In this area you can upload PDF-documents up to a size of 32MB. The PDF-documents can also be located in a ZIP-file.
signature-verification.upload-area-text: In this area you can upload PDF-documents up to a size of 32MB via Drag & Drop or by selecting them directly. The PDF-documents can also be located in a ZIP-file.
signature-verification.queued-files-empty2: You can now upload more documents
signature-verification.upload-status-file-text: ({{fileSize}}) is currently uploading and being processed...
signature-verification.confirm-page-leave: Are you sure you want to leave this page? There are still signed documents ready to be downloaded.

signature-verification-extern.headline: Verify signed Documents
signature-verification-extern.description-text: To check a PDF signature for validity, please use the verification service of the Rundfunk und Telekom Regulierungs-GmbH. This verification service allows you to check whether the document contains a valid signature.
signature-verification-extern.link-label: Switch to the RTR verification service
signature-verification-extern.adobe-reader-text: Furthermore, it is also possible to verify the signature locally with the Adobe Reader.
signature-verification-extern.adobe-link-label: More information about verification with Adobe Reader

error-permission-message: You need have permissions to use the official signature to use this function!
error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
error-cancel-message: The signature process was manually aborted.
error-rights-message: Abort due to insufficient rights of your account.
label-manual-positioning-missing: Existing signature present, please select its positioning manually.
error-manual-positioning-missing: One or more signatures in the queue must be positioned manually.
